advice.title: Expert Advice
advice.description: Navigate the Norwegian immigration system with confidence. Our experienced consultants provide clear, professional guidance on permits, documentation, and legal requirements.
advice.servicesSubtitle: Click on any service to get in touch with us

immigration.title: Immigration Matters
immigration.description: Get expert guidance on all immigration-related questions and processes. We help you understand your options and navigate the system effectively.

residence.title: Residence Permits
residence.description: Professional assistance with residence permit applications, renewals, and requirements. We ensure your documentation is complete and accurate.

work.title: Work Permits
work.description: Comprehensive support for work permit applications. We help both employers and employees with the necessary documentation and procedures.

family.title: Family Reunification
family.description: Expert guidance on family reunification processes. We help you bring your loved ones together with proper documentation and legal support.

tax.title: Tax Cards
tax.description: Assistance with tax card applications and related matters. We help you understand the Norwegian tax system and ensure compliance.

advice.ctaDescription: Don't navigate the complex immigration system alone. Our experts are ready to guide you through every step of the process.

travel.title: Discover Sri Lanka
travel.description: Experience the magic of Sri Lanka - a tropical paradise with ancient temples, pristine beaches, lush tea plantations, and incredible wildlife. Let us create your perfect journey.
travel.packagesSubtitle: Tailored packages for every type of traveler
travel.customDesc: We can create a personalized itinerary based on your preferences and budget.

week1.title: 1 Week Escape
week1.details: Perfect for a quick getaway, this 7-day package covers Sri Lanka's must-see highlights. Start in vibrant Colombo, climb the ancient Sigiriya Rock Fortress, and unwind at a beautiful beach resort. Ideal for first-time visitors wanting a taste of Sri Lanka's diverse offerings.
week1.itinerary: Day 1-2: Colombo exploration & city highlights. Day 3-4: Sigiriya Rock Fortress & Dambulla Cave Temple. Day 5-7: Beach resort relaxation in Bentota or Hikkaduwa with optional water sports.
week1.includes: Return flights, 4-star hotels, daily breakfast, airport transfers, English-speaking guide

days10.title: 10 Days Explorer
days10.details: Our most popular package! Experience the best of Sri Lanka in 10 days - from ancient temples to wildlife safaris, misty tea plantations to golden beaches. This perfectly balanced itinerary combines culture, nature, and relaxation.
days10.itinerary: Day 1-3: Cultural Triangle - Sigiriya, Polonnaruwa, Anuradhapura. Day 4-5: Kandy & tea country. Day 6-7: Yala National Park safari. Day 8-10: Southern coast beaches & Galle Fort.
days10.includes: Return flights, boutique hotels, daily breakfast, all transfers, safari jeep, train tickets, English-speaking guide

weeks2.title: 2 Weeks Discovery
weeks2.details: Discover Sri Lanka at a relaxed pace with this comprehensive 14-day journey. From the Cultural Triangle to the hill country, and from whale watching to cooking classes - experience authentic Sri Lanka with time to truly connect with each destination.
weeks2.itinerary: Day 1-4: Cultural Triangle exploration. Day 5-7: Kandy, Nuwara Eliya & scenic train journey. Day 8-9: Ella's stunning landscapes. Day 10-11: Yala safari & Tissamaharama. Day 12-14: Mirissa whale watching & Galle heritage.
weeks2.includes: Return flights, premium hotels, breakfast & select dinners, all transfers, cooking class, whale watching tour, English-speaking guide

days20.title: 20 Days Ultimate
days20.details: The ultimate Sri Lankan experience! This 20-day luxury journey covers every corner of the island with premium accommodations and a dedicated private guide. From hidden gems to iconic landmarks - no stone left unturned in this comprehensive adventure.
days20.itinerary: Complete island circuit including Jaffna in the north, east coast beaches, Cultural Triangle, hill country, national parks, and the entire southern coast. Includes off-the-beaten-path experiences and exclusive access to local communities.
days20.includes: Return flights, 5-star hotels & boutique stays, all meals, private vehicle & driver, personal guide, all activities & entrance fees, special experiences

wantToSpeak.description: Have questions about immigration, permits, or travel? Schedule a personal consultation with our experts. We're here to listen, guide, and help you find the best solutions.
